title: Wolf Tooth Brings the Morse Cage Ti In-House
content: The titanium Morse cages Wolf Tooth has been having a hard time keeping in stock is now back and theyâ€™re now making these cages in-house. Named after the dash-dot-dash design found on the backing of the cage, which allows for 32mm of vertical adjustment, these titanium cages weigh only 33g and will probably outlive you! They retail for $69.95 and are in stock now, so head on over to Wolf Tooth to see more.
author: prolly
